  • Method Details

    • menuSystem

      public void menuSystem()
      Displays the menu system for the Hotel Reservation System. Allows the user to perform various operations such as adding a hotel, viewing hotels, managing hotels, simulating bookings, and logging out.

    • printMenu

      public void printMenu()
      Prints the Main Menu Choices
